name: Pokee & Blue
description:
Pokee & Blue (Prototype)

Pokee & Blue is a procedural turn-based isometric rogue-like, where the right moves are required to survive forest. This is a prototype, some features may not work correctly, particularly on mobile devices.

Follow progress on Twitter @Maytch

How to play:

Moving costs a turn, moving into an object will attack it. Spells (when picked up) can be cast anytime before movement without a turn cost, but require recharging. Watch out for enemy attack patterns!

Press I to change control input method!

Mouse Controls
  • Mouse Left Click - Move / Attack
  • Mouse Right Click - Spell Cast
  • Mouse Scroll-Wheel Hold - Spell select menu
Mobile Controls
  • Tap Screen - Move / Attack
  • Tap Spell Icon - Spell Cast
Gamepad Controls (Xbox)
  • Left Analogue Stick - Point to tile / spell
  • A Button - Move / Attack
  • X Button - Spell Cast
  • Left Trigger Hold - Spell select menu
Keyboard Controls
  • Arrow Keys - Point to tile / spell
  • S Key - Move / Attack
  • A Key - Spell Cast
  • Shift Key Hold - Spell select menu
  • + / - Key - Adjust volume
